title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 157 - Extensions Of Time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 157 - Extensions Of Time

State Regulations
§ 157.1 - Extensions of time-general rule
§ 157.2 - Application for automatic extension of time for filing New York State income tax returns
§ 157.3 - Additional extension of time
§ 157.4 - Extensions of time for United States citizens abroad
§ 157.5 - Extension of time for payment of New York State personal income tax, City of New York tax and City of Yonkers tax
§ 157.6 - Repealed
§ 157.7 - Interest and additions to tax
§ 157.8 - Cross-references

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 157

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 652[a], 657[a], 697

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
